dcterms:creator: O. Shchur
M. Mumme
A. Bojchevski
S. G¨unnemann
dcterms:description: A dataset containing computer products from Amazon, where nodes represent products and edges indicate that the products are usually bought together. The task is to predict the category of the products.
dcterms:title: Amazon Computers

dcterms:creator: O. Shchur
M. Mumme
A. Bojchevski
S. G¨unnemann
dcterms:description: A dataset containing photo products from Amazon, where nodes represent products and edges indicate that the products are usually bought together. The task is to predict the category of the products.
dcterms:title: Amazon Photo

dcterms:creator: B. Rozemberczki
C. Allen
R. Sarkar
dcterms:description: A dataset representing a social network of developers on GitHub, where nodes correspond to developers and edges indicate mutual follow relationships. The task is to infer whether a node relates to web or machine learning development.
dcterms:title: GitHub

dcterms:creator: B. Rozemberczki
C. Allen
R. Sarkar
dcterms:description: A dataset representing Facebook pages, where nodes are Facebook pages and edges imply mutual likes between the pages. The task is to identify the page’s category.
dcterms:title: Facebook PagePage

dcterms:creator: O. Shchur
M. Mumme
A. Bojchevski
S. G¨unnemann
dcterms:description: A dataset representing a co-authorship network in physics, where nodes represent authors and edges indicate co-authorship. The task is to infer the main research field of the authors.
dcterms:title: Coauthor Physics

dcterms:creator: B. Rozemberczki
C. Allen
R. Sarkar
dcterms:description: A dataset representing Twitch gamers, where nodes correspond to gamers and links reveal mutual friendships. The task is to infer if a gamer uses explicit content.
dcterms:title: TwitchEN

dcterms:creator: O. Shchur
M. Mumme
A. Bojchevski
S. G¨unnemann
dcterms:description: A dataset representing a co-authorship network in computer science, where nodes represent authors and edges indicate co-authorship. The task is to infer the main research field of the authors.
dcterms:title: Coauthor CS

dcterms:creator: A. Bojchevski
S. G¨unnemann
dcterms:description: A citation network dataset where nodes represent papers and edges correspond to citations. The task is to predict the research area of the papers.
dcterms:title: DBLP

dcterms:creator: O. Shchur
M. Mumme
A. Bojchevski
S. G¨unnemann
dcterms:description: A dataset representing biomedical literature, where nodes represent articles and edges refer to citations between them. The task is to infer the topic of the documents.
dcterms:title: PubMed

dcterms:creator: O. Shchur
M. Mumme
A. Bojchevski
S. G¨unnemann
dcterms:description: A citation network dataset where nodes represent documents and edges refer to citations between the documents. The task is to infer the topic of the documents.
dcterms:title: Cora

dcterms:creator: O. Shchur
M. Mumme
A. Bojchevski
S. G¨unnemann
dcterms:description: A citation network dataset where nodes represent documents and edges refer to citations between the documents. The task is to infer the topic of the documents.
dcterms:title: CiteSeer

dcterms:creator: W. Hu
M. Fey
M. Zitnik
Y. Dong
H. Ren
B. Liu
M. Catasta
J. Leskovec
dcterms:description: A citation network of computer science papers in arXiv, where nodes represent papers and directed edges refer to citations among them. The task is to predict the research area of the nodes.
dcterms:title: ogbn-arxiv

dcterms:creator: W. Hu
M. Fey
M. Zitnik
Y. Dong
H. Ren
B. Liu
M. Catasta
J. Leskovec
dcterms:description: A co-purchasing network where nodes represent products and links are present whenever two products are bought together. The task is to infer the category of the products.
dcterms:title: ogbn-products

dcterms:creator: W. Hu
M. Fey
M. Zitnik
Y. Dong
H. Ren
B. Liu
M. Catasta
J. Leskovec
dcterms:description: A heterogeneous network formed from a subgraph of the Microsoft Academic Graph (MAG), where nodes can belong to different types and directed edges belong to various categories. The task is to predict the venue of the nodes that are papers.
dcterms:title: ogbn-mag

dcterms:creator: W. Hu
M. Fey
M. Zitnik
Y. Dong
H. Ren
B. Liu
M. Catasta
J. Leskovec
dcterms:description: A network whose nodes represent proteins and edges indicate different types of associations among them. The task is to predict multiple protein functions.
dcterms:title: ogbn-proteins
